member.name: T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CryptoSignedXmlRecursionException
member.summary: This exception helps catch the signed XML recursion limit error. This is being caught in the SignedXml class while computing the hash. ComputeHash can throw different kind of exceptions. This unique exception helps catch the recursion limit issue.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue.GetXml
member.summary: Create an XML representation.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DSAKeyValue.LoadXml(System.Xml.XmlElement)
member.summary: Deserialize from the XML representation.
member.param: An containing the XML representation. This cannot be null.
member.exception: The XML has the incorrect schema or the DSA parameters are invalid.

member.name: M:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.IsOverXmlDsigRecursionLimit
member.summary: This method validates the _xmlDsigSearchDepthCounter counter if the counter is over the limit defined by admin or developer.
member.returns: returns true if the limit has reached otherwise false

member.name: P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml.XmlDSigSearchDepth
member.summary: Gets / Sets the max limit for recursive search of encryption key in signed XML

member.summary: Create an XML representation.

member.summary: Deserialize from the XML representation.
member.param: An containing the XML representation. This cannot be null.
member.exception: The XML has the incorrect schema or the RSA parameters are invalid.

member.summary: The signature is being rejected by the signature format verifier due to having a canonicalization algorithm which is not on the known valid list.

member.summary: The signature is being rejected by the signature verifier due to having a transform algorithm which is not on the known valid list.
